content: sts half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet increase slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet chain 1 do not turn 74 sts r 4 half_double_crochet 1 in same st as slip_stitch half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet in each of next 30 sts *half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 2* 3x half_double_crochet in each of next 28 sts half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet increase slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet chain 1 do not turn 80 sts r 5 half_double_crochet 1 in same st as slip_stitch half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet in each of next 31 sts *half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 3* 3x half_double_crochet in each of next 28 sts half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet increase slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet chain 1 do not turn 86 sts r 6 half_double_crochet 1 in same st as slip_stitch half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet in each of next 32 sts *half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 4* 3x half_double_crochet in each of next 28 sts half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet increase slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet chain 1 do not turn 92 sts r 7 half_double_crochet 1 in same st as slip_stitch half_double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 1 in each of next 33 sts *half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 5* 3x half_double_crochet 1 in each of next 28 sts half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 5 half_double_crochet increase slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet chain 1 do not turn 98 sts r 8 - v1 bphdc 1 in same st as slip_stitch bphdc in each st around pm in last st do not chain 1 do not turn 98 sts or r 8 - v2 half_double_crochet 1 in same st as slip_stitch half_double_crochet in each st around pm in last st do not chain 1 do not turn 98 sts © wollhaus 2025 www wollhaus com tibby bag we will now be working in a seamless spiral instead of implementing slip_stitch ch1 between rounds you will place a marker in the last st of every round to help you keep track of rounds moving same marker every round r 9 half_double_crochet 1 into first st of r 8 half_double_crochet 97 sts pm in top of last st 98 sts r 10-21 half_double_crochet 98 sts pm in top of last st 98 sts change to color b for color change blip to fall in a less visible place you may want to work a few more sts in color a for pattern sample this was after 6 sts into r 22 r 22-32 half_double_crochet 98 sts pm in top of last st 98 sts r 33 half_double_crochet 5 sts half_double_crochet decrease *half_double_crochet 5 sts half_double_crochet decrease* 13x pm in top of last st 84 sts r 34 half_double_crochet 2 sts *half_double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet 4 sts* 13x half_double_crochet 2 sts pm in top of last st 70 sts h������ beginning of round will have traveled a few sts to the right half_double_crochet to left edge of bag when laid flat for pattern sample this was 9 sts from original marker placement 3 sts if marker was moved
